roi-sub-1-text-4: Use our ROI calculator to figure out how much time
roi-sub-1-text-5: and money you can save monthly with
roi-sub-1-text-6: promiseQ in a few simple steps:
roi-sub-1-text-7: 1. Number of monthly alarms and cameras
roi-sub-1-text-8: 2. Input the operator salary and number of operators
roi-sub-1-text-9: 3. Find out savings and growth potential for your business!
roi-sub-2-text-2: Operator count in SOC per shift
